'''Mythcon 29''' was the twenty-ninth annual [[Mythopoeic Society]] conference. 

*'''Theme: "'''[[C.S. Lewis]]: A Centenary Celebration"
*'''Guests of Honor:''' Paul F. Ford (Lewis scholar) and [[Verlyn Flieger]] (Inklings scholar)
*'''Chairman:''' [[Diana Glyer]]
